tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Now that we have these basic definitions in place, we may do a first backtest.

paragraphs.text: We are not ready to the test the idea as we've only defined the trigger on and trigger off events. We just want to make sure we got the definitions right.
Although the strategy will eventually include logic relating to the 1H chart, the current definitions involve the 24H chart only.
We are going to run a backtesting session between January 1st and October 1st, 2020, on the 24H time frame. Take a look at the Time Range and Time Frame parameters and make sure they match the above!
